author: Staff Reporter
text:
A free one-day training programme on ‘Carp fish farming’ will be held at the Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Veterinary College and Research Institute premises on Mohanur Road on January 27.

A press release from N.Akila, Senior Scientist and Head, said that the programme would deal with rearing the fish, selection of the place for pond, feed management and to increase productivity. The release said that carp fish farming is very profitable and farmers, members of self-help groups, youth and interested persons can participate in the training programme. For registration contact phone: 04286-266345 and 266650. Last date for registration is January 26.
title: Training on fish farming
